configs.description: Remove this piece of shit with 'anyOf' after solving https://discuss.gurock.com/t/bug-api-different-types-of-returned-data-for-case-fields-configs/10598

anyOf.description: An object wrapped in an array with two default keys, 'context' and 'options'

description.description: The description for the new custom field

system_name.description: The system name for custom field

type.description: See {@link org.touchbit.testrail4j.core.type.FieldTypes} You can pass the number of the type as well as the word, e.g. 5, string, String, Dropdown, 12. The numbers must be sent as a string e.g {type: "5"} not {type: 5}, otherwise you will get a 400 (Bad Request) response.

include_all.description: Set flag to true if you want the new custom field included for all templates. Otherwise (false) specify the ID's of templates to be included as the next parameter (template_ids)

template_ids.description: ID's of templates new custom field will apply to if include_all is set to false
